keepLifecycleScripts.description: Enable this to keep the 'scripts' section in `package.json`. Read the NPM Blog on 'Package install scripts vulnerability' â€“ http://blog.npmjs.org/post/141702881055/package-install-scripts-vulnerability

copyReadme.description: For Typescript projects, enable this to copy README.md to the output directory specified in your tsconfig.json

assets.description: A list of files or directory that are copied into the output directory. Glob patterns are accepted.

localDependencies.description: Include a list of local dependencies to insert into the `dependencies` section of your package manifest.

^(?:@[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+/)?[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+$.description: Defines a local dependency that will be added to your package manifest.

rootDir.description: The path to the local dependency's root directory (i.e. the location of its `package.json` file) relative to this file.

version.description: Specify a version number to include in this project's package manifest.

lib.description: Description of the library's entry point.

entryFile.description: The name of the entry .ts or .js file. (default: `public_api.ts`).

bin.description: For libraries with a CLI, the name of the bin .ts or .js file. (default: `bin.ts`)
